name: 3D TIME TRIAL
description:
3D TIME TRIAL is my prototype racing game on Unity. I developed a car controller on C# and implemented it in the game. I've created racing games before because they are super popular to develop but this game is a prototype where I used the basic controller setup with a basic user interface with a background and buttons for the main menu.

Controls: W or Up (Accelerate),  A or Left Arrow (Turn Left), D or Right Arrow (Turn Right), S or Down Arrow (Stop)
